alert.note: Alert for Inland Worcester; Maryland Beaches; Somerset (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 08 at 3:10PM EST until January 10 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM TUESDAY TO 4 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...South to southeast winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...In Maryland, Somerset County, Inland Worcester County, and the Maryland Beaches. In Virginia, Northumberland, Lancaster, Middlesex, Mathews, Accomack and Northampton Counties. * WHEN...From 4 PM Tuesday to 4 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
